name: Jean Bonde D'York
description:
You are the director of the next Bollywood blockbuster movie : Jean Bonde D'York vs Dr. Baye Honne.

Your job is to place planes and explosives in each scene in order to help Jean Bonde York reach Dr. Baye Honne position in the most epic way as possible (left click to place an element, right click to remove it, right and left arrow to move the camera). Explosive can only be placed on vertical surfaces. Once the scene is set, you can start the action phase by pressing space (just press space again if you want to go back to preparation phase). In this phase, Jean will run straight forward (and jump if facing a pit). You can activate the elements you have placed (by left-clicking on them) in the previous phase. Explosive will make Jean jump further and higher if he is in their detonation radius, and planes are temporary platforms that take a small delay before arriving.

 Complete all six scenes to finish the game and produce the best Bollywood blockbuster ever made !

This game was created by Alexaline Thomas (dev), Ponton Benjamin (dev and level designer), Prie Amélie (pixel artist, vfx and animation) and Viriot Maël (music and sfx) for the Coding Blocks game jam 2022 with the theme "It's following me".
